Package io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.engine.ReqResManager.httpReq

Class HttpRequest

java.lang.Object
io.github.lycoriscafe.nexus.http.engine.ReqResManager.httpReq.HttpRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpGetRequest, HttpPostRequest
public sealed class HttpRequest extends Object permits HttpGetRequest, HttpPostRequest
Parent HTTP request class.
Since:
v1.0.0

    • getRequestId

      public long getRequestId()
      Get unique identifier for this request based on RequestConsumer. It means when a connection received, the id will begin to cont from 1 to Long.MAX_VALUE (if hit, connection reset).
      Returns:
      Unique identifier for this request
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • RequestConsumer
      • HttpRequest

    • finalizeRequest

      public void finalizeRequest()
      Finalize the HTTP request. It means process errors and if no errors found, call the appropriate endpoint methods and vice versa. Child classes of this class also overrides this method and process some HTTP request method related operations.
      Since:
      v1.0.0
      See Also:
      • HttpGetRequest.finalizeRequest()
      • HttpPostRequest.finalizeRequest()
      • HttpRequest
      • ReqMaster
      API Note:
      This method is public but not useful for the API users. Only used for in-API tasks.
